sentences.english: Splint keeps big toe aligned and held in place with Velcro. Best for people with hallux valgus.
sentences.chinese: 固定拇趾于正确位置，适合拇趾外翻人士使用。

sentences.english: Splint keeps big toe aligned and held in place with Velcro. Best for people with hallux valgus.
sentences.chinese: 固定拇趾于正确位置，适合拇趾外翻人士使用。

sentences.english: Fungal infections occur in toenails more often than in fingernails.
sentences.chinese: 真菌感染较多的发生在大拇趾的趾甲上。

sentences.english: The Big Toe Contest $50 First Prize
sentences.chinese: 大拇趾比赛，第一名奖金50元。

sentences.english: We knew by working the plantar surface of the big toe you could make someone constipated.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道按摩大拇趾底部可以让人便秘。

sentences.english: A bony bump at the base of the big toe, a bunion causes that toe to deviate toward the others.
sentences.chinese: 拇趾囊肿是指连接大拇指的骨头肿大而向外突出。

sentences.english: High heels don't cause bunions, but they sure can aggravate them.
sentences.chinese: 高跟鞋不会导致拇趾囊肿，但他们肯定会加重他们。

sentences.english: Goodness, Hayden, I didn’t know you had a big toe.
sentences.chinese: 海登，我一点儿也不知道你也有一个大拇趾。

sentences.english: Hallux support toe-bar prevents the foot from slipping forward to improve grip.
sentences.chinese: 拇趾支持脚趾酒吧防止脚向前滑动，以改善抓地力。

sentences.english: Methods Vascularized skin flap taken from the fibular side of great toe was applied to repair the defect.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用吻合血管的拇趾腓侧皮瓣游离移植。

sentences.english: Hayden and I inspected his big toe. It did look healthy.
sentences.chinese: 我们仔细检查了他的大拇趾，它看上去的确非常健康。

sentences.english: Your big toe, for example, it’s connected straight to your head.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，你的大拇趾直接对应你的脑袋。

sentences.english: To cure a sore throat, you massage the middle joint of the big toe.
sentences.chinese: 要治喉咙痛，你就按摩大拇趾关节的中间。

definition: variant of 腳趾|脚趾[jiao3 zhi3]
